## Exercise 2

```{r}

library(pacman)

pacman::p_load(
        tidyverse,
        sf
        )

cancer01 <- read.csv(
         file = "data/Chapter07/USCSlung.csv",
         header = TRUE
         )

cancer02 <-  cancer01 %>% 
  rename(name = Area) %>%
  mutate(
  `Age adjusted rate\n(per 100,000)` = AgeAdjustedRate)

load("data/Chapter07/US_income_cartogram.rda")

cancer02 <- left_join(US_income_cartogram, 
            cancer02, by = c("name"))
cancer02 <- st_transform(cancer02, 3857)

  ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = cancer02,
  aes(
  fill = `Age adjusted rate\n(per 100,000)`), 
  colour = "gray20") +
  scale_fill_distiller(type = "seq", palette = "RdPu",  
         direction = 1) +
  theme_us +
  theme(
    legend.position = c(0, 1.02),
    legend.justification = c(0.5, 1.1),
    plot.margin = margin(2, 2, 2, 1.5),
    legend.background = element_rect(
    fill = "transparent", colour = NA),
    axis.text = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank(),
    axis.line = element_blank()
  )

```
